channel.title: [508]::master dont work need bad help [508]
channel.description:
Ok i go into my server im p rights 2 and i put ::master for p rights 2 and when i type ::master all my stats STAY SAME
How do i fix i have ::master in commands.java
what do i do to make it change my stats?
P.S if you could tell me some other 508 tuts such as how to make fullscreen
i need answers badly i have had this for ages

item.title: [508]::master dont work need bad help [508]

item.title: [508]::master dont work need bad help [508]
item.dc:creator: @I_kolo_I I kolo I
item.description:
@I_kolo_I wrote:

or

go into client.java and search:

(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master")

you will see and list that you gain when you type it like:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(999999999, 0); addSkillXP(999999999, 1); addSkillXP(999999999, 2); addSkillXP(999999999, 3); addSkillXP(999999999, 4); addSkillXP(999999999, 5); addSkillXP(999999999, 6); addSkillXP(999999999, 7); addSkillXP(999999999, 8); addSkillXP(999999999, 9); addSkillXP(999999999, 10); addSkillXP(999999999, 11); addSkillXP(999999999, 12); addSkillXP(999999999, 13); addSkillXP(999999999, 14); addSkillXP(999999999, 15); addSkillXP(999999999, 16); addSkillXP(999999999, 17); addSkillXP(999999999, 18); addSkillXP(999999999, 19); addSkillXP(999999999, 20); addSkillXP(999999999, 21); addSkillXP(999999999, 22); addSkillXP(999999999, 23); addSkillXP(999999999, 24); sendMessage(""+ playerName +" .. you gain some lvl's!"); }
